title: Cinefantastique Vol 31 No 8 (October 1999)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Cover features on The X Files. Other stories include Star Wars: The Phantom Menace, David Cronenberg's Crimes of the Future and Red Cars, Dudley Do-Right, Elmo in Grouchland, Lost Souls, The Astronaut's Wife, the Buffy the Vampire Slayer spin-off Angel, Mystery Men, The Specials, Stir of Echoes, the TV series Wild Wild West and the big-screen adaptation.
